title: Game won't connect!!
body: After champ select is finished the game just won't load in and comes up with recconect straight away. If i click reconnect nothing happens at all. PLease help!

replies.body:
Try running through the possible solutions here and see if any work out:
https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/LbPY3Rpr-experiencing-a-tech-problem-find-the-common-fixes-here#matchmaking
